statements: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE segmentation_category = 'VIP';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE preference1 = TRUE AND preference2 = FALSE;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE preference1 = TRUE ORDER BY customer_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE segmentation_category = 'High Value' ORDER BY customer_id DESC
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, segmentation_category FROM customers WHERE preference2 = TRUE AND email LIKE '%gmail.com%'
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, preference1, preference2 FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' OR customer_name LIKE 'B%' ORDER BY customer_id
SELECT customer_name, email, preference1 FROM customers WHERE segmentation_category IS NULL
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE segment = 'VIP';
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT campaign_name, content FROM campaigns ORDER BY campaign_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE segment='VIP' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, preferences FROM customers WHERE segment='Regular' ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, segment, preferences->'language' AS language_preference FROM customers WHERE segment='Premium' ORDER BY name;
SELECT customer_id, email, name, segment, preferences->'preferences'->>'color' AS favorite_color FROM customers WHERE segment='Regular' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, content FROM campaigns WHERE segment_filter='Women' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE segmentation = 'VIP';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email_address, segmentation FROM customers WHERE email_address LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM campaign_targets WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE segmentation = 'VIP';
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns WHERE status = 'Active' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address, preferences FROM customers INNER JOIN campaign_targets ON customers.customer_id = campaign_targets.customer_id WHERE campaign_targets.segment = 'New Customers';

SELECT customers.customer_name, customers.email_address, campaign_targets.segment FROM customers LEFT JOIN campaign_targets ON customers.customer_id = campaign_targets.customer_id WHERE campaign_targets.status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM Customers;
SELECT name, email FROM Customers WHERE segment='Premium';
SELECT customer_id, preference FROM Customers WHERE name='John Doe';
SELECT * FROM Customers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT campaign_id, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE segment = 'New Customers';
SELECT name, email FROM Customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, email, segment FROM Customers WHERE segment = 'VIP' AND preference = 'Email';
SELECT c.name, cm.open_rate FROM Campaigns c INNER JOIN CampaignMetrics cm ON c.campaign_id = cm.campaign_id WHERE c.start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT cr.response_type, COUNT(cr.response_id) FROM CampaignResponses cr GROUP BY cr.response_type ORDER BY COUNT(cr.response_id) DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, segment FROM customers WHERE segment = 'VIP';
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age >= 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, name, segment FROM customers WHERE segment = 'VIP' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT c.name, p.preference FROM customers c JOIN preferences p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.preference = 'Newsletter';
SELECT cr.customer_id, cr.opens, cr.clicks, c.campaign_name FROM campaign_results cr JOIN campaigns c ON cr.campaign_id = c.campaign_id WHERE cr.opens > 100 ORDER BY cr.clicks DESC;

SELECT c.campaign_name, c.start_date, c.end_date, COUNT(cr.result_id) AS total_results FROM campaigns c LEFT JOIN campaign_results cr ON c.campaign_id = cr.campaign_id GROUP BY c.campaign_name, c.start_date, c.end_date ORDER BY total_results DESC;
